BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-clix
BundleInfo.Author: Hanjin Liu
BundleInfo.Synopsis: A powerful ChimeraX command line interface
BundleInfo.Description:
CliX has several features that will change your experience.
- Syntax highlighting - Suggestions and completions (command, keyword, file path, model ID, chain ID and more) - Inline suggestion of the matched history - Powerful history search - Multi-line execution - Tooltip for command help
If you want to replace the built-in command line interface with `clix`, open `Favorites > Settings...` and define a startup as follows: >>> ui tool hide "command line interface" >>> ui tool show clix ```

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: clix show :: General :: clix show command
ChimeraX :: Command :: clix import history :: General :: clix import history command
ChimeraX :: Command :: clix preference :: General :: clix preference command
